oneOf.description: Glob pattern matching input TypeScript files to process
Array of glob patterns matching input TypeScript files

outputDir.description: Directory where processed files will be written

deleteOriginFile.description: If set to true, will delete the original input file after processing. Use with caution.

action.description: Specifies how to handle hidden fields - either comment them out with // or remove them completely

generateOmitTypes.description: When true, generates TypeScript types that omit the hidden fields from the original types

generatedOmitTypesOutputPath.description: File path where the generated TypeScript types that omit hidden fields will be written

hide.description: Array of configurations specifying which fields to hide and where to hide them

oneOf.description: A single field name or pattern (e.g. '*At' matches createdAt, updatedAt)
Array of field names or patterns to hide

field.description: Specifies which field(s) should be hidden - can be exact names or glob patterns

oneOf.description: Array of glob patterns matching type names where fields should be hidden

target.description: Specifies which Prisma types the hiding should be applied to

on.description: Whether to hide fields on input types, output types, or both
